name: 01 | LAB PLANNING AND SCHEDULING
step_description: We ensure efficient use of resources with automated & data-driven laboratory planning, covering short and long-term requirements, E2E linked to the supply chain and production schedule.

name: 02 | SPECIFICATION CREATION AND HANDLING
step_description: We establish a strong foundation through automated, standardized, and globally unified procedures & specification management

name: 03 | SAMPLING AND SAMPLE STORAGE
step_description: Sampling, handling and storage activities are automated, traceable, and synchronized, with real-time visibility and efficient distribution

name: 04 | TESTING PREPARATION AND EXECUTION
step_description: Our lab operations are automated or guided by digital workflows following standardized methods with review by exception

name: 05 | RESULT GENERATION, EVALUATION & RELEASE
step_description: We uses AI-supported evaluation and automated review by exception, to ensure efficient and accurate results

name: 06 | QC DATA ANALYSIS AND TRENDING
step_description: Our user-centric framework allows continuous & automated QC data analysis, supported by AI to identify patterns across the analytical panel

name: 07 | QC EQUIPMENT READINESS
step_description: We use standardized lab equipment, that is fully connected, while always having transparency on equipment related data and status to operate seamlessly
